snippet: A new ruling blocks an effort to overturn Minnesota’s corporate contribution ban.
abstract: Editorial applauds appeals court ruling that rejected a constitutional challenge to Minnesota's ban on direct corporate contributions to state political campaigns; contends ruling casts no doubt on the constitutionality of the urgently needed federal disclosure bill Senate Republicans succeeded in blocking in July.
lead_paragraph: A new ruling blocks an effort to overturn Minnesota’s corporate contribution ban.

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject
